{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Poison Barb |image = [[File:Bag_Poison_Barb_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Poison Barb''. |dex = 40 |effect = Clicks do more damage }} The '''Poison Barb''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the damage of clicks. The Poison Barb is unlocked after catching 40 unique pokemon. ==Details== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! {{Infobox Oak Item |name = Poison Barb |image = [[File:Bag_Poison_Barb_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Poison Barb''. |dex = 40 |effect = Clicks do more damage }} The '''Poison Barb''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the damage of clicks. The Poison Barb is unlocked after catching 40 unique pokemon. ==Details== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !!
